abstract: Brit anti-aircraft guns hit German plane
snippet: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS, Namsos, Norway, April 30--Six waves of German planes bombed this British landing base for ten hours today with a heavy toll of life and the destruction of a British destroyer, which was left a blazing shell....

headline.main: NAZI BOMBERS RAID NAMSOS TEN HOURS; Destroyer Wrecked in One of Six Attacking Waves--Two Planes Reported Downed

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS, Namsos, Norway, April 30--Six waves of German planes bombed this British landing base for ten hours today with a heavy toll of life and the destruction of a British destroyer, which was left a blazing shell.
